author: legolas
title: Ok, I'll start writing something bcs I have many credits from my sales!
content: Sauron is not good, it hurts people. What is it any way? she? he? freaking psycho maniac holding over all the bankstones! IT being the first born of all doesn't give authority to do whatever IT wants!

title: We are recruiting developers, program manager, community manager, content creators
